page.title: 07 PUBLIC HOUSES
page.content: "The Dog House"(G.R.448987)is 300 years old and gained its name from the fact that it was built on the site of a boarding kennel for Oxford University. The landlords name is Mr. Edwards. The PUB can hold up to 150 people and daily gets about 200 CUSTOMERS.The pub sells 200 BARRELS of beer per year.Mr. Edwards has been running the pub for 3 months. "The Black Horse"(G.R.466987) can hold up to 120 people.It has two poltergeists(SUPERNATURAL creatures) Mrs. Farlon,the landlady,has been running the pub for 5 years.The pub sells 300 barrels of beer per year. There has been a pub on this site since before 1688. Both are original Morland's pubs. Both sell hot food."The Dog House" provides accomodation. (Darren Haynes)
